loops.name: Loop_through_Assets

textTemplates.name: Laptop1ONLY
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.First_Name__c}!

We heard today is your last day with Better Rehab. While we’re sad to see you leave, we’re happy and excited for your next move. Please read this email carefully for instructions on how to return your IT equipment. 

Assets to be returned

Please find the below IT assets that are assigned under your name and return these assets to your direct supervisor. 
 
Number of Assets assigned: {!AssetCount}
Laptop Serial No: {!LaptopRecord1.Name}
Laptop Link: https://betterrehab.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/IT_Asset__c/{!LaptopRecord1.Id}/view
 
Please contact IT immediately if you do not possess the above-mentioned asset at it@betterrehab.com.au.
 

How to Return your IT Assets

Here’s a guide to help you prepare your devices to be returned to IT.

Phones

Please follow the steps below to factory reset your iPhone. This will remove all data from the phone.

Please get in touch with IT if you wish to save any data before proceeding. 
  1. Sign-out of iCloud account. 
    • Go to Settings, click on your name displayed on the top of the screen. 
    • Scroll all the way down and click sign-out, it might prompt you with the password, please proceed with the positive responses. 
    • Factory Reset. 
      • Go to Settings, Click on General. 
      • Scroll all the way to the bottom > Click Reset
      • Click Reset All Content and Settings, It might prompt you for your Pin and please confirm. 
      • This will take about 5-10 mins.

      Laptop

      Please ensure you erase all the personal data from your laptop. Better Rehab is not liable for the loss of any personal data stored on the laptop. 
      1. Upload all files/folders to Sharepoint to ensure a smooth handover.
      2. Setup auto-forwarding on your mail box to appropriate people to ensure all email communications after your exit reaches the right people or team. 
      3. Please take pictures of any physical damages to the laptop if any and send them to IT@betterrehab.com.au.
      4. DO NOT leave sticky notes with your laptop PIN or passwords under any circumstances. 
      5. Please do not forget to return your laptop charger.

      Handover

      Please handover your devices to your Direct Supervisor after completing above steps.
